entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
